root.name: Vessel
root.description: OverviewPlayers take the role of inventor Arkwright, whose living liquid creatures 'Fluros' have decided to wreak havoc for whatever reason. Puzzles involving combinations of lava, water, and various matter to create new Fluros which can melt, change, and repair etc. will be necessary to stop the destruction.System requirementsOS: Windows 7 / Vista / XPProcessor: Dual Core 2.0GHz or equivalent processorMemory: 2GB System RAMHard Disk Space: 1.5GBVideo Card: ATi Radeon HD 2400 or NVIDIA GeForce 7600 or better (Shader Model 3.0 needs to be supported)DirectXÂ®: 9.0cSound: DirectX compatible
